numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that younger people tend to think more optimistically than older people.
2. Younger people tend to think that the world will become a better place.
3. I wonder why different age groups think differently in certain places.
4. I wonder why different age groups think differently in other places.
6. I noticed that many people think differently based on where they came from.
7. This difference could represent the difference between places.
